courses.description:
ELEC-UF  101 Topics in the Humanities 
Baseball and Cultural Identity: El Gran Pastiempo Internacional

How did America's "National Pastime" become El Gran Pastiempo Internacional?  This course will look at the role baseball has played, and continues to play, in the construction of cultural identity in the United States, East Asia, and Latin America.  Over the course of semester, we will look at baseball not just as a sport, but as a lens through which we can view various cultures, paying attention to issues of race, gender, nationalism, and internationalism.

courses.course_name: Topics in the Humanities:The Making( And Remaking) of Tel Aviv-Jaffa
